ygData.subject: Re: where do I hunt at 5th lvl?
ygData.msgSnippet: The only problem with going to crushbone as a necro, is the orcs there are allied with Nerriak...hence causing you a big problem later on down the road. ...
ygData.messageBody:
The only problem with going to crushbone as a necro, is the orcs there are
allied with Nerriak...hence causing you a big problem later on down the
road.

----- Original Message -----
From: Mata <mata_eq@...>
To: <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, May 21, 1999 10:34 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] where do I hunt at 5th lvl?


So yah think if I went into GF and went to Crushbone I would do ok?
;-) as long as I can dodge the guards.

----- Original Message -----
From: Jaded
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
Sent: Friday, May 21, 1999 9:49 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] where do I hunt at 5th lvl?


I had a gnome magician once. When I got to 5 I left Steamfont. You CAN
still find rogue clockworks outside the newbie area, but you have to
constantly dodge young ebony drakes and things.

-----Original Message-----
From: Mata [mailto:mata_eq@...]
Sent: Friday, May 21, 1999 9:39 AM
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] where do I hunt at 5th lvl?


I made 5th lvl last night and my little gnome necro is doing fine, but I
can see now I am starting to get too powerful w/ my big Skeleton buddy for
the kolbolds. They CON Black and when I was 4th I was taking on 2 yellows
and winning! I love being a necromancer.


Anyway where can I go to find L5-9 MOBs in STEAMFONT???

Thanks!
